module.name: Misc Applications
module.description: Adds the ability to create feature codes that can go to any FreePBX destination (such as an IVR or queue)
module.changelog: *15.0.8* FREEI-922 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *15.0.7* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.6* FREEPBX-20481 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 13) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is not restoring the Feature codes for Misc application entries. *15.0.5* Fixing FREEPBX-19768 *15.0.3* fixing legacy restore *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Add Backup 15
